mapper.select: SELECT APPLY_YEAR, ATTEND_TIME, QUIT_TIME, OVER_TIME, NIGHT_TIME, LUNCH_START_TIME, LUNCH_END_TIME, DINNER_START_TIME, DINNER_END_TIME FROM BASE_WORK_TIME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BASE_WORK_TIME ( APPLY_YEAR, ATTEND_TIME, QUIT_TIME, OVER_TIME, NIGHT_TIME, LUNCH_START_TIME, LUNCH_END_TIME, DINNER_START_TIME, DINNER_END_TIME ) VALUES ( #{applyYear}, #{attendTime}, #{quitTime}, #{overTime}, #{nightTime}, #{lunchStartTime}, #{lunchEndTime}, #{dinnerStartTime}, #{dinnerEndTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE BASE_WORK_TIME SET ATTEND_TIME = #{attendTime}, QUIT_TIME = #{quitTime}, OVER_TIME = #{overTime}, NIGHT_TIME = #{nightTime}, LUNCH_START_TIME = #{lunchStartTime}, LUNCH_END_TIME = #{lunchEndTime}, DINNER_START_TIME=#{quitTime}, DINNER_END_TIME=#{overTime} WHERE APPLY_YEAR = #{applyYear}
